paper_abstract: We consider extended variants of spiking neural P systems with decaying spikes (i.e., the spikes have a limited lifetime) and/or total spiking (i.e., the whole contents of a neuron is erased when it spikes). Although we use the extended model of spiking neural P systems, these restrictions of decaying spikes and/or total spiking do not allow for the generation or the acceptance of more than regular sets of natural numbers.
paper_title: EXTENDED SPIKING NEURAL P SYSTEMS WITH DECAYING SPIKES AND/OR TOTAL SPIKING
